name: Boat Simulator Driving Games
description:
A super realistic Boat challenges and many more! Become a Coast Guard, rescue people who are in trouble! Let's start your parking journey to perform an emergency rescue operation.

Addictive 3D Boat simulator, you'll have a chance to test your parking skills in sailing a realistic physics boat. This game gives you the most realistic parking experience of boats. It has filled with amazing and exciting levels.

Become a member coastguard team, looking for a people who need help to solve their problem rescue them before they sink into the sea. Be aware in your surroundings. Don't forget you are a coastguard the quicker you will find people, the faster you will able to help them! Download now "Boat Simulator Driving Games" to start your parking rescue mission.

How to Play:
- Choose your favorite boat and start your mission
- Follow the checkpoints to park your boat in the right place
- Become a Coast Guard and take the civilians to the safe place
- Multiple tasks to perform the rescue mission

Features:
* More than 50 levels to play
* Immensely collection of boats, each one is different & unique
* Realistic boat physics with touch control
* Beautiful sailing environment to perform the parking mission
* Save the life of people who are in trouble! let's help them
* Park, your boat to become a parking master
* Real water physics and parking mechanics control

So get ready and start the motor of your boat to drive carefully. Perform the driving and parking mission carefully. You will be rewarded with the completion of a level. Play and Enjoy!
